code: import React from"react";import{grey}from"@material-ui/core/colors";import WhatsAppIcon from"@material-ui/icons/WhatsApp";import InstagramIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Instagram";import FacebookIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Facebook";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConnectionIcon=_ref=>{let{connectionType}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[connectionType==='whatsapp'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhatsAppIcon,{fontSize:"small",style:{marginBottom:'-5px',color:"#25D366"}}),connectionType==='instagram'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InstagramIcon,{fontSize:"small",style:{marginBottom:'-5px',color:"#e1306c"}}),connectionType==='facebook'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FacebookIcon,{fontSize:"small",style:{marginBottom:'-5px',color:"#3b5998"}})]});};export default ConnectionIcon;
